title: G2 Support main needing duo to get back into Plat before Season End!!
body: Got dropped from plat. Need a duo to help get me back into plat ASAP. Pref an adc main. Message me on here or add me in game; Gangsta Duck

replies.body: Sadly I don't think thats possible,well barely possible.Season rewards are distrubuted in 2 days,unless you go non-stop gaming 24/7 i don't think it would be possible especially your gold II.2 ranks before plat V
